pageContext.claim: “Some home energy bills will be really historically cut -- it's actually amazing -- as well as historically low gasoline prices. Gasoline prices -- you look today -- I think it was $1.99.”
pageContext.analysis: The president should check his sourcing. Gasoline prices did drop to around $1.93 in April, but were closer to $2.30 in July, according to the U.S. Energy Information Association.
